gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Lib

Class CoreNormObj

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Lib.CoreNormObj

  • public class CoreNormObj
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the base object of Unicode Core Norm. This object is need in the recursive Unicode Core Norm operation.

    History:

    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team
